description: This is the ultimate travel planner and assistant.Use this guide as a template to plan and manage your upcoming trip.For anyone looking to travel to Kochi (Cochin), India, you want this guide.I visited the city and found the best things to do, amazing places to eat, great places to stay, where to rent a bike, and created a mobile-friendly guide ready to act as your personal travel assistant.This guide includes a currency converter, local time and weather, travel tips, cafes and co-working spots
